paragraph: Agvaantserengiin Enkhtaivan (born 1958, Mongolian: Агваанцэрэнгийн Энхтайван) is a Mongolian music composer and film maker who studied in Russia. He is the director of the film A Pearl in the Forest. In 1990, he became famous in Mongolia by being selected to play the lead role of Temüjin (Genghis Khan) in the Mongolian film, Under The Eternal Blue Sky, directed by Baljinnyam.
Original soundtrack for the feature film "A Pearl in the Forest (Moilkhon)"
